name: clrp
body:
--SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON|OFF

CREATE PROCEDURE $CURSOR$
(
	--@parameter_name AS scalar_data_type ( = default_value ), ...
)
-- WITH EXECUTE AS CALLER|SELF|OWNER| 'user_name'
AS EXTERNAL NAME -- assembly_name.class_name.static_method_name
GO
